#
# r | art
#

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

# circle

```{r}
seq(0, 1, 0.01) %>%
data.frame(a=.) %>%
ggplot(aes(x=(a), y=(0))) +
geom_point(alpha=.2, color="#000000", size=0) +
coord_polar() +
theme_void()
```

# flower | rose

```{r}
seq(-pi, pi, 0.01) %>%
data.frame(a=.) %>%
ggplot(aes(x=(a), y=(2 * sin(4 * a)))) +
geom_point(alpha=.2, color="#000000", size=0) +
coord_polar() +
theme_void()
```

# flower | rose #2

```{r}
seq(-2*pi, 2*pi, 0.01) %>%
data.frame(a=.) %>%
ggplot(aes(x=(a), y=(cos(3 * a)))) +
geom_point(alpha=.2, color="#000000", size=0) +
coord_polar() +
theme_void()
```

# <3

```{r}

# shape (201, 1) -> (40401, 2)

seq(-1, 1, 0.01) %>%
expand.grid(x=., y=.) %>%
ggplot(aes(x=(pi * x - cos(y^2)), y=(1 - sin(x^2)))) +
geom_point(alpha=.02, color="#000000", size=0) +
coord_polar() +
theme_void()
```

# save

```{r}
t <- format(Sys.time(), format="%F_%H-%M")
fn <- paste(t, "png", sep=".")
ggsave(fn, units="in", width=1800/300, height=1800/300)
```
